name: Unlock Me (itch)
description:
Don't roam in the city. Know about the Coronavirus pandemic.

Act like a policeman, and catch people.
People are annoying, they go anywhere. Place police checkpoints to block roads.
Caught someone? You must know why...?

Research and solve questions to unlock a new mode. 

Free to play on mobile.

A new map on every level.

Customize your car.

Unique game play.

Earn rewards and be fast.

Try both the modes during the lockdown and when lockdown failed. Survive without being affected by Covid-19.
